summary: The Global Markets unit in the Commerce Department's International Trade Administration helps small- and medium-sized U.S. businesses enter and expand into international markets. In May 2023, we found that the Global Markets unit didn't have a comprehensive strategic workforce plan and needed to address human capital office vacancies. We held six focus group sessions with employees to get their perspectives on these and other issues...
title: International Trade Administration: Global Markets Employee Focus Groups Raise Workforce Management Concerns
